enabled.name: Bot Enabled
enabled.description: Enables the bot on this server.

command_prefix.name: Command Prefix
command_prefix.description: The bot processes messages starting with this prefix as commands.

mods_override_limits.name: Moderators Override Limits
mods_override_limits.description: Defines whether users with the moderator role override all category-, and command limits.

hide_invalid_errors.name: Hide Invalid Command Errors
hide_invalid_errors.description: Hides error when a user runs a command that does not exist.

hide_disabled_errors.name: Hide Disabled Errors
hide_disabled_errors.description: Hides errors about the bot, category, or command being disabled.

hide_role_errors.name: Hide Role Errors
hide_role_errors.description: Hides errors about the user missing a role from the whitelist or having a role from the blacklist for categories and commands.

hide_channel_errors.name: Hide Channel Errors
hide_channel_errors.description: Hides errors about the command not being enabled or being disabled in this channel.

hide_whitelist_role.name: Hide Whitelisted Roles
hide_whitelist_role.description: When role errors are shown and user has none of the whitelisted roles, hide them from the user.

hide_blacklist_role.name: Hide Blacklisted Role
hide_blacklist_role.description: When role errors are shown and user has a blacklisted role, hide it from the user.

essential_channels.name: Essential Channels
essential_channels.description: Channels that are required for bot operation

bot_channel.name: Bot Channel
bot_channel.description: The channel the bot posts its status messages in (eg updates).

mod_channel.name: Moderator Channel
mod_channel.description: Moderation related messages are posted in this channel (eg user joins).

log_channel.name: Log Channel
log_channel.description: Logs are posted in this channel (eg deleted messages)

essential_roles.name: Essential Roles
essential_roles.description: Roles that are required for bot operation

mod_role.name: Moderator Role
mod_role.description: Role to have default control over the bot
